name: Distactia
description:
Made in 7 days for the HaxeJam. 

--------------------------------------

You're an overlord who has lost all of his vassals. It's up to you to find them again and regain your power to get through each level.

A simple game made in Heaps for the 2021 HaxeJam. Collect your vassals in order to solve puzzles in the game. Talents are the key to solving the puzzles.

-------------------------------------

Controls:

R: Restart the current level that you're on.

Up, Down, Left, Right

Left Click to move through menus.
